body:
Comment 9: 
Using r57.2, if you run 

$ hg id
9d7967223815 (release-branch.r57) release/release.r57.2
$ cd $GOROOT/src
$ ./all.bash

the end of the output should look like this,

--- cd ../test
1 known bugs; 0 unexpected bugs

ALL TESTS PASSED

---
Installed Go for linux/amd64 in /home/peter/go.
Installed commands in /home/peter/go/bin.
The compiler is 8g.

The $GOROOT/test/bugs/bug322.dir directory contains a test for the known and not
unexpected (and not fixed) compiler bug322.

After r57.2, bug322 was fixed. Now, using the latest revision, if you run

$ cd $GOROOT/src
$ hg pull
$ hg update default
$ hg id
dd7479dd252a tip
$ cd $GOROOT/src
$ ./all.bash

the end of the output should look like this,

--- cd ../test
0 known bugs; 0 unexpected bugs

ALL TESTS PASSED

---
Installed Go for linux/amd64 in /home/peter/go.
Installed commands in /home/peter/go/bin.
The compiler is 8g.
